title: _NDIS_TCP_RECV_SEG_COALESCE_OFFLOAD (ntddndis.h)
description: The NDIS_TCP_RECV_SEG_COALESCE_OFFLOAD structure contains the offload support state for receive segment coalescing (RSC).
